contents: Article 3 (Scope of Application) ① This regulation applies to the referee committee (hereinafter referred to as *committee), member event group referee committee, and registration referees. ② Member sports organizations must establish ‘Referee Committee Regulations’, including necessary matters, approved by the Board of Directors in accordance with these regulations, and report them to the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council). ③ If these regulations and the relevant organization’s referee committee regulations are different, these regulations shall apply first. ④ Matters concerning the composition and meetings of the committee shall follow the ‘Regulations on the Establishment and Operation of the Advisory Committee’ of the Sports Council, except as specifically provided in the Articles of Association of the Sports Council and these regulations. Revised 2019. 1. 31. [Fully revised 2021. 12. 27.]
